11.content:
Japan is home to rich culture, beautiful nature, good food and bizarre activities practiced nowhere else in the world. The sport of Keijo is one of these activities and enjoyed by the spectators and athletes alike. This sport is a recently legalized gambling sport that involves young women standing on top of a floating surface called a Land and attempt to knock each other into the pool. The last one on the land is the winner.

There is one catch to the sport though, the players can only use their boobs and butts to knock each other off the Land. It sounds eccentric but it is actually a very unique way of battling your opponent. So girls train their bums and breasts to take on any challenge that awaits them.

There have even been schools established for the sole purpose of teaching young women to safely and properly play Keijo. These schools Setouchi Academy in Western Japan and Suruga Academy in Eastern Japan have been training the best and brightest mind and bodies in Keijo history.

The famous East-West war between the two schools ended with Setouchi breaking a years-long win drought. The young ladies of Setouchi couldn’t be happier and relieved st their victory.

And then they went back to their academy to finish their studies. And that’s when the professors had something that would change Keijo forever...Futanari solutions.

Soon after their recent victories against Suruga, the staff of Setouchi introduced a serum to the girls that when injected into the bloodstream, gave females male genitalia. The girls were a little reluctant at first but then were shown the sights of their teachers, including Miss Ujibe, having fully grown cocks right above their vaginas, and matching balls hanging between their legs.

Before they could wonder why their teachers would want penises, they explained that they could use this new organ to maybe use in Keijo, but also to use among their love interests if they had any. Many girls were reluctant but some were ecstatic about the thought of having dicks of their own. Eventually, they all submitted into the treatment.

One injection to the arm and one night of waiting later, the girls of Setouchi Academy were blessed with new body parts that could lead to a whole new world of erotic opportunities...

So who should we start with?

Laura Edwards and Maria Bishop decided to get together to go visit their friend, Katyusha Cherneko, who lived in Ukraine, for a surprise visit to be exact. Since they hadn’t seen each other in a long time (outside of world meetings), Belgium and Seychelles packed their things, booked themselves a flight to Ukraine to visit Katyusha, and they headed out to the airport in getting into Belgium’s car with their things. Laura continued to drive for several minutes as they arrived at the airport, parked the car before they got out with their things, getting on their plane as they made it in time, and they got ready in their seats as the plane took off.
The plane continued to fly as they couldn’t wait to see their friend, then Maria said, “This is so exciting! I can’t wait to see Katyusha.”
“I know, I can’t wait to see the look on her face when she sees us.” The Belgian lady said; she couldn’t wait to see Ukraine either.
The flight continued for a few more hours, they soon arrived at a Ukrainian airport as the plane started to descend for landing. The two were more excited as the plane landed, then came to a complete stop. They got off of the plane, went to get their suitcases at the pick up and they got their respective suitcases as they went out, calling a taxi.
They got in the taxi with their things and Laura told the taxi driver Katyusha’s address. The taxi driver then started to drive, heading to their friend’s place. The driver continued to drive for several minutes, then they arrived at Katyusha’s place as the taxi driver pulled up. The driver parked his car, Belgium and Seychelles paid the driver as they got out of the car, retrieved their suitcases, and they headed for the door with the suitcase. They got to the door as the taxi driver left, Maria knocked on the door, and they both waited for Katyusha to open the door.

They continued to wait, then they heard a familiar female voice on the other side of the door, “Coming, coming.” They both smiled as the door opened, revealing Ukraine.
Belgium and Seychelles smiled as they both said, “Surprise!”
Ukraine smiled as she giggled and said, “You two certainly surprised me but it’s great to see you. Come in, come in, so you don’t freeze yourselves out here in the cold.”
“What cold there isn’t-” Maria said, then she was cut off by a sudden snow storm out of nowhere.
Laura said as they both quickly rushed inside the Ukrainian’s house and Katyusha moved out of the way, “You and your big mouth.” They got inside as Katyusha closed the door behind them.
The three just laughed at the moment as Ukraine said, “Well anyway I’m glad that you two are here. Why don’t you two head for the guest room and get yourselves settle while I make some nice drinks for us?”
“Sounds good and thanks.” Belgium said as they headed to the guest rooms, taking their suitcases with while the curvy Ukrainian woman made some hot drinks for them.

“I know as we’ve had our hands tied with work and such.” Seychelles said as Laura nodded her head. “That’s for sure! I thought I was going die of working so much, even with my brother’s help.” She said.
